div.div: ANN model validation of individual-tree observed and predicted basal area and volume increment.
div.p:
(
a ) basal area increment (BA: cm 2 5-year -1), (
b ) BA increment residual plot, (
c ) volume increment (m 3 5-year -1), and (
d ) volume increment residual plot. ME is model efficiency, BIAS is the average difference between predicted and observed data (eq 6), and RMSE is the root mean squared error.
